## Purpose

This folder stores recurring tasks, routines, workflows, and repeating processes.

---

## What Goes Here

- Daily routines and habits
- Weekly recurring tasks
- Monthly procedures
- Quarterly reviews and planning
- Annual workflows and checklists

---
